name: Elminage II: Sousei no Megami to Unmei no Daichi
name_original: Elminage II: Sousei no Megami to Unmei no Daichi
description:
Peaceful days flowed in the beautiful land of Finus Rade. However, one day, the shadow of an ancient evil spirit trying to seize its sovereignty... "Collect the lost artifacts before the evil spirits. Great wealth and honor to those who gather them."

A sequel to the royal road full-scale 3D dungeon RPG "Erminage Original" that emphasizes freedom and replayability. Players can freely choose characters from 12 races and 16 occupations to create their own party. In the dungeons, you will encounter vicious and unique monsters, various traps, and unknown treasures. With the "face load" and "style load" functions, you can freely change the graphics of your character, so you can empathize with your own character.

The astonishing truth that gradually becomes clear as the adventure progresses. The events scattered all over the place are difficult to fully enjoy in one clear. That's why those who set foot in this land once want to visit again and again and step into the dungeon, no matter how dangerous it may be.
